mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, status, create_time, update_time FROM t_brand ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_brand (name, description, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE t_brand SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
